Utils3D

Class LinearScale3

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils3D.LinearScale3

  • public class LinearScale3
extends java.lang.Object
    LinearScale3 is a common math object that easily computes linear scales in 3D. Computes Y from X with the following relation : Y = (A * X) + B, where all symbols are Vector3.
    Since:
    2.0
